_sText:
Well at last I have finished the map, I have had fun making & playing the map, along with watching other people play the map

The end of the 1st map is very tight gaps, but once you have done it , you will be able to do it easier the next time you play, but don't give up you will do it.

There is a camera gun at the end of the 1st stage(red)  on the 2nd map, this can be seen throughout the maps on the monitors above the glass

On completing the map you can get on top of the glass & teleport round the map using the little coloured blocks, this can also take you back to the start
